thread.title: Did health concerns cost Dont'a Hightower millions of dollars in NFL free agency?
thread.title_full: Did health concerns cost Dont'a Hightower millions of dollars in NFL free agency?

author: Mark Inabinett | minabinett@al.com
title: Did health concerns cost Dont'a Hightower millions of dollars in NFL free agency?
text: The New York Jets reportedly offered free-agent linebacker Dont'a Hightower a five-year contract worth $55 million, with another $7 million available in incentive bonuses. But the former Alabama All-American signed a four-year deal last week with the New England Patriots worth $35.5 million, with another $8 million available in incentives.
